name: European Association of Fruit and Vegetable Processors
goal:
PROFEL monitors legislative developments relevant to the fruit and vegetable processing sector, coordinates technical projects and scientific research to face joint challenges, provides information and support to its members, advises them on policy matters likely to affect their businesses, such as regulatory, agricultural and trade-related policies,promotes a spirit of cooperation between the different countries, provides expertise and input to legislators and decision-makers,
PROFEL promotes a positive image for the processed fruit and vegetable sector by raising the profile of the products our members produce through communicating the following benefits:
- Excellent nutritional qualities – processed fruit and vegetables maintain vital nutrients during processing and thus contribute significantly to the recommended daily intake of essential nutrients
- Industry compliance with highest quality and production standards
- Product availability year-‘round at stable prices
- Convenience and long shelf life.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Environment, Food Safety, Trade
euInitiatives: Drinking Water Director, the Pesticides Regulation, VCOOL, Product Labelling
